name: Foundations and Substructure
description: Traditional strip foundations supporting load-bearing walls. Suspended timber ground floor construction with ventilated sub-floor void. Damp proof course (DPC) visible at base of external walls.

name: Roof Coverings
description: Gable main roof, covered with traditional slate, cement-fixed concrete ridge tiles and cement verges. Lead flashings are present to the valleys and wall abutments. There is a lower-level mono pitched roof serving the utility area with slate coverings and lead flashings

name: Chimneys
description: Brick-built chimney stacks with concrete flaunching, terracotta pots, and lead flashings at roof junction. Multiple flues serving fireplaces on different floor levels.

name: Rainwater Disposal System
description: PVC guttering and downpipes fixed to fascia boards. Underground drainage connections to soakaways and main drainage system. Includes hoppers and brackets.

name: Sofits and Fascias
description: UPVC soffit and fascia boards with ventilation slots. Includes barge boards to gable ends and decorative features where present.

name: Main Walls
description: Solid brick construction with cavity wall to more recent extensions. Includes pointing, render where present, and decorative features such as string courses and corbelling.

name: Windows and Doors
description: Mix of UPVC double-glazed windows and traditional wooden sash windows. External doors include main entrance door, rear access, and French doors where present. Includes frames, glazing, and security features.

name: Roof Structure
description: Traditional timber roof trusses with purlins and rafters. Includes roof void insulation, ventilation, and structural timbers supporting roof coverings.

name: Ceilings
description: Mixture of lath and plaster and plasterboard ceilings. Includes cornicing, ceiling roses, and access hatches where present. Various heights and finishes throughout property.

name: Walls and Partitions
description: Mix of solid masonry and timber stud partitions with plasterboard finish. Includes wall tiles in wet areas, picture rails, and dado rails where present.

name: Floors
description: Combination of suspended timber floors and solid concrete construction. Various floor finishes including carpets, tiles, and timber boards. Includes underfloor access where present.

name: Internal Joinery
description: Internal doors, architraves, skirting boards, and built-in storage units. Includes staircases, handrails, and balustrades where present.

name: Sanitaryware & Kitchen
description: Bathroom suites including WCs, basins, baths, and shower enclosures. Kitchen units, worktops, and integrated appliances where present. Includes all associated plumbing fixtures.

name: Fireplaces
description: Original and converted fireplaces, including surrounds, hearths, and flues. Gas fire points and electric fire installations where present.

name: Cellar
description: Below-ground storage area with masonry walls and concrete floor. Includes access stairs, lighting, ventilation, and any tanking systems present.

name: Electrical Installation
description: Consumer unit, wiring system, power outlets, and lighting circuits. Includes external power points, security lighting, and any supplementary electrical installations.

name: Gas Installations
description: Gas meter, supply pipework, and distribution system. Includes gas appliance connections and safety devices. All installations comply with current Gas Safety regulations.

name: Cold Water Supply
description: Mains water supply, stop cock, internal distribution pipework, and storage tanks where present. Includes insulation and frost protection measures.

name: Hot Water Supply / Heating Installations
description: Boiler system, hot water cylinder, heating controls, and radiator circuit. Includes programmers, thermostats, and zone control valves.

name: Surface water & Soil drainage
description: Underground drainage system including inspection chambers, gullies, and connection to main sewer. Surface water drainage including soakaways and land drainage where present.

name: Boundaries, Fencing, Drives, Lawn, etc
description: Property boundaries marked by fencing, walls, or hedges. Includes driveways, paths, patios, and landscaped areas. Garden features such as sheds, greenhouses, and external storage.
